channel.title: New Movies
channel.description:
So ever since i saw the movies "I an number 4" "battle:LA" and "red riding hood" i think these movies were boring ass hell. i'll tell you why. --"i am number 4" sucked because no real dangers except for maybe like 5 dudes running around with weaponry they don't know how to use.Cliffhanger was gay. And really the dudes could have been easily been taken out with a single sniper rifle.oh yeah and The ONLY funny part was when the mutated dog battled against the monstar that could glide.Not exciting at all ---"battle LA" sucked because its basically everything you would expect to see in every movie.happy ending(aliens retreat)Some sad parts(pablos dad dies) And for some reason they zoomed in on everything except the damn aliens like really?When they were disecting the alien they kept shaking the damn camera like omg stay still for a sec and let me see tha alienz. Didn't like it -----"red riding hood" Crappy twisted ending. Though some guy would turn into a vampire for some reason(get it?)Uhm nothing different from the book. OH yeah and many random people die for no reason at all.
all in all i say the new movies are turning out to be very crappy and boring
so what do you think?

item.title: New Movies
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

B2300 T4nk:

You guys forgot that 2012 isnt crappy

I didn’t watch that movie because I know that is how it will be like in 2012, people loosing their minds or something. Plus the fact that I’ve seen one too many movies as similar as that movie.

item.title: New Movies
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:10, topic:389070”]Faster was a great movie to me, little interesting kind of twist and less foreshadowing.

Battle: Los Angels was awesome to me, but it was kind of obvious that something like the aliens retreating would of happened. A lot of great reviews about the movie was submitted, so I can’t complain all too much.

Red Riding Hood is something I have not seen before, and thought it was going to be stupid therefore I didn’t bother with it.[/quote]

I agree with you and casey. faster was a nice movie, it did [quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:6, topic:389070”]hold my interested throughout.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: New Movies
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Faster was a great movie to me, little interesting kind of twist and less foreshadowing.

Battle: Los Angels was awesome to me, but it was kind of obvious that something like the aliens retreating would of happened. A lot of great reviews about the movie was submitted, so I can’t complain all too much.

Red Riding Hood is something I have not seen before, and thought it was going to be stupid therefore I didn’t bother with it.

item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

just recently purchased faster and miracle at ST. Anna Both held my interested throughout.

faster was good, though not great.

I recommend tron though. If was just released on DVD. Though if you want a movie in theaters now, I’ve seen these recently.
Comedy: Paul
Scaryish: Insidious
All around good movies: Limitless, Source code.

50$? Its £5 for a ticket here. Popcorn + drink like another 5.
